judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.

parties: Leonard E. BLOOM, William H. Loose, and William M. Vogle, Appellants, v. BOROUGH OF PHILIPSBURG.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, ZAPPALA and CAPPY, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward S. Blanarik, Jr., State College, for appellants.

casebody.head_matter:
574 A.2d 602
Leonard E. BLOOM, William H. Loose, and William M. Vogle, Appellants, v. BOROUGH OF PHILIPSBURG.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 10, 1990.
Decided May 23, 1990.
Edward S. Blanarik, Jr., State College, for appellants.
John W. Burge, Lancaster, and Michael L. Brungo, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
